quotes: Enrique Miguel Iglesias-Preysler (born 8 May 1975), known professionally as Enrique Iglesias,
Iglesias started his career in the mid-1990s on an American Spanish-Language record label Fonovisa Records under the name Enrique Martinez,
By the turn of the millennium, he had made a successful crossover into the mainstream market and signed a multi-album deal with Universal Music Group for US $68,000,000
In 2010, he parted with Interscope Records and signed with another Universal Music Group label Republic Records to release bilingual albums.
In 2015, Enrique parted ways with Universal Music Group after a decade. He signed with Sony Music; his upcoming albums will be by Sony Music Latin in Spanish and RCA Records in English.
JULY 5, 2025: Granca Live Fest - Canary Islands

organizations.name: Billboard
quotes: Iglesias has scored over 150 number-one hits across all of the Billboard charts.

organizations.name: Guinness World-Record
quotes: He holds the Guinness World-Record for producing 28 number-one Spanish-language singles on the Billboard’s Hot Latin Tracks.
